Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client

Interface UI

All Known Implementing Classes:
CLI, GUI
public interface UI
UI is the interface for the user interface. It bears all the methods to view what is happening on the Match and to communicate to the Server through the ClientSocketHandler. It is implemented by the GUI and the CLI

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void buildUpdate​(java.lang.String player, int x, int y)
    Called to update the BoardRepresentation: the specified player built on the specified coordinates
    void endTurn()
    Called when the player ends their turn
    void failedLogin​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> usernames)
    Handles the failure to log to the match
    void inLobby()
    Called when the player correctly joined a lobby
    void invalidBuild​(java.util.Map<Action,​java.util.List<Pair<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer>>> possibleActions, int wrongX, int wrongY, int actualX, int actualY)
    Tells the player that they commit a wrong build (coming from the server)
    void invalidMove​(java.util.Map<Action,​java.util.List<Pair<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer>>> possibleActions, int wrongX, int wrongY, int startX, int startY)
    Tells the player that they commit a wrong move (coming from the server)
    void invalidWorkerPlacement()
    Called when the server meets a wrong workers' placement
    void invalidWorkerSelection​(int wrongX, int wrongY)
    Called when the server finds a wrong worker's selection
    void lobbyFull()
    Called when the player joined a full lobby
    void login()
    Logs to a match from the UI
    void loser​(java.lang.String username)
    Manages a losing player
    void moveUpdate​(java.lang.String player, int xFrom, int yFrom, int xTo, int yTo)
    Called to update the BoardRepresentation: the specified player moved a worker form the from coordinates to the to position
    void performAction​(java.util.Map<Action,​java.util.List<Pair<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer>>> possibleActions)
    Displays a list of actions and the valid positions so that a player can choose
    void placeWorkers()
    Places the worker of the player on the UI and the match
    void playerDisconnection​(java.lang.String username)
    Manages the disconnection of a player
    void playersDivinities()
    Called to display the list of players' divinities
    void selectDivinity​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> divinitiesNames)
    Called when the user has to pick their divinity
    void selectPlayableDivinities​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> divinitiesNames, java.util.List<java.lang.String> divinitiesDescriptions, int playersNumber, java.util.List<java.lang.String> players)
    Method to choose the divinities that can be picked by the players and the starting player.
    void selectWorker()
    Asks the player which worker they want to select
    void serverDisconnection()  
    void start()
    Initializes the UI

    • failedLogin

      void failedLogin​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> usernames)
      Handles the failure to log to the match
      Parameters:
      usernames - List of strings of the already logged players

    • selectPlayableDivinities

      void selectPlayableDivinities​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> divinitiesNames, java.util.List<java.lang.String> divinitiesDescriptions, int playersNumber, java.util.List<java.lang.String> players)
      Method to choose the divinities that can be picked by the players and the starting player. See for a further description with an example of application.
      Parameters:
      divinitiesNames - List of all divinities
      divinitiesDescriptions - List of their effects
      playersNumber - number of players in game
      players - Names of the players

    • moveUpdate

      void moveUpdate​(java.lang.String player, int xFrom, int yFrom, int xTo, int yTo)
      Called to update the BoardRepresentation: the specified player moved a worker form the from coordinates to the to position
      Parameters:
      player - name of the player moving
      xFrom - beginning worker's position
      yFrom - beginning worker's position
      xTo - destination worker's position
      yTo - destination worker's position

    • buildUpdate

      void buildUpdate​(java.lang.String player, int x, int y)
      Called to update the BoardRepresentation: the specified player built on the specified coordinates
      Parameters:
      player - name of the building player
      x - coordinate of the tile built
      y - coordinate of the tile built

    • workerPlacementUpdate

      void workerPlacementUpdate​(java.lang.String player, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Called to update the board: it places the workers of a player on the specified positions
      Parameters:
      player - name of the player to retrieve their color
      x1 - first worker's coordinate
      y1 - first worker's coordinate
      x2 - second worker's coordinate
      y2 - second worker's coordinate

      void serverDisconnection()
